item.title: Lead Finder Tool
item.description: Unlock a constant flow of high-quality leads and revolutionize your agency's growth with our Lead Finder Tool, guaranteed to increase your sales pipeline by at least 30% in the next 6 months - or we'll work with you until you get the results you deserve.

item.title: Profit Margin Calculator
item.description: Unlock the secret to maximizing your agency's profitability with our intuitive Profit Margin Calculator, and discover how you can boost your bottom line by up to 30% in just a few clicks, without sacrificing client satisfaction or team efficiency.

item.title: Revenue Growth Calculator
item.description: Unlock the secret to predictable profits and transform your agency's bottom line with our Revenue Growth Calculator - the ultimate game-changer that helps you accurately forecast and achieve double-digit growth, while eliminating the guesswork and securing your spot as the go-to expert in your industry.

item.title: Conversion Rate Calculator
item.description: Unlock the secret to maximizing your clients' ROI and transforming your agency into a revenue-generating powerhouse with our Conversion Rate Calculator - the ultimate game-changer that helps you pinpoint profit-boosting opportunities, optimize campaigns, and deliver jaw-dropping results that will leave your clients begging for more!

item.title: Project Pricing Estimator
item.description: Transform your business with our Project Pricing Estimator, the game-changing tool that helps you quote with confidence, win more bids, and boost profitability in just minutes!

item.title: Client Acquisition Cost Calculator
item.description: Unlock the secret to maximizing your marketing budget with our Client Acquisition Cost Calculator, and discover how to turn every dollar into a profitable customer!

item.title: Influencer Outreach Cost Estimator
item.description: Revolutionize your influencer marketing campaigns with our game-changing Influencer Outreach Cost Estimator, which instantly calculates the exact cost of partnering with social media's biggest stars and saves you thousands of dollars in negotiation time!

item.title: Agency Fee Calculator
item.description: Unlock instant profitability insights with our Agency Fee Calculator, the ultimate game-changer that helps you optimize pricing, maximize revenue, and outshine the competition in minutes!

item.title: Social Media Budget Planner
item.description: Transform your social media strategy with our game-changing Budget Planner, and skyrocket your online presence with data-driven decisions that drive real results and maximize your ROI!

item.title: Content Marketing ROI Calculator
item.description: Unlock the secret to justifying your content marketing budgets and wowing clients with data-driven results using our intuitive Content Marketing ROI Calculator, guaranteed to boost your agency's profitability and growth.

item.title: SEO Keyword Auditor
item.description: Unlock the full potential of your clients' online presence with our SEO Keyword Auditor, the game-changing tool that streamlines keyword research, identifies gaps, and boosts campaign ROI, all while saving your team time and increasing your agency's competitive edge.
